description.en: Pulse is an internet radio community originally started in 2019, after much disrespect and un-professional antics across the radio community; we decided to make our own project that gives people the chance and opportunity to take control of how they want a community.
description.ga_IE: Is pobal raidió Idirlín é PULSE a thosaigh ar dtús in 2019, tar éis go leor dímheasúil agus antics neamh-ghairmiúil ar fud an phobail raidió;Shocraíomar ár dtionscadal féin a dhéanamh a thugann deis do dhaoine an deis agus an deis a fháil chun smacht a fháil ar an dóigh a dteastaíonn pobal uathu.
